resources.string: Once a retreat for Hawaiian royalty and today is often called one of the best beaches on Maui.
This secret south Maui paradise is an ideal getaway for white sand beach and an underwater reef.
The calm waters offer great swimming, and natural tide pools give children the opportunity to see sea creatures up close.
This extension of Kaʻanapali Beach is an ideal spot for snorkeling and scuba diving.
Napili Bay is well known for its golden sand, great snorkeling and picture-perfect sunsets.
Beautiful, calm waters make for great snorkeling and swimming for the kids.
Spread across the beautiful Mission Bay Park, SeaWorld is known for its amazing animals, interactive attractions and rides.
San Diego zoo is a tropical oasis with amazing habitats for gorillas, Komodo dragons, tigers, polar bears, and pandas.
Families can enjoy rides, shows and attractions! Marvel at cities built entirely out of millions of LEGO® bricks.
Experience a world-class collection of historic sailing ships, steam-powered boats, and submarines.
San Diego's 'only' National Park offers tremendous views and excellent opportunities to explore it's history.
Located on Mission Beach, Belmont Park is San Diego's only beachfront amusement and entertainment center!
Boasting stunning views of the San Diego Harbor, Coasterra is the ideal destination for intimate sunset dining.
Peohe’s captures the essence of Southern California dining with its stunning bay front views and a chic tropical vibe.
Blue Point was the first seafood and oyster bar to open in the Gaslamp and it remains one of the very best.
This three-floor oceanview stunner offers choose-your-own-adventure dining, spanning a casual rooftop terrace.
Starlite helped kickstart the concept of a craft cocktail bar that serves great food and is still one of the best.
This restaurant offers menu of Southern Italian seafood dishes made with modern innovations on Italian classics.
Lane Field Park Markets is a beautiful open air food market serving craft coffee and food from local vendors.
Shop, dine, relax and explore Del Mar Highlands Town Center located in the heart of Carmel Valley.
Westfield UTC is San Diego's iconic, open-air shopping, dining and entertainment destination.
Stroll through the center's beautiful courtyards with fountains, statues and elegant architecture.
The Bazaar del Mundo Shops is a great spot for handcrafted gifts and treasures that are unique in all the world.
Explore Shops at The Del, a colorful bazaar of designer labels, fine jewelry, home accents, bath and spa products.
